00042 bool InetAddr::initialize(struct sockaddr_in *addr, const char *host, uint16_t port) {
00043   memset(addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00044   {
00045     struct hostent *he = gethostbyname(host);
00046     if (he == 0) {
00047       std::string errMsg = (std::string)"gethostbyname(\"" + host + "\")";
00048       herror(errMsg.c_str());
00049       return false;
00050     }
00051     memcpy(&addr->sin_addr.s_addr, he->h_addr_list[0], sizeof(uint32_t));
00052   }
00053   addr->sin_family = AF_INET;
00054   addr->sin_port = htons(port);
00055   return true;
00056 }
00057 
00058 bool InetAddr::initialize(struct sockaddr_in *addr, const char *addrStr) {
00059   const char *colon = strchr(addrStr, ':');
00060   uint16_t port;
00061   std::string host;
00062 
00063   if (colon) {
00064     host = std::string(addrStr, colon-addrStr);
00065     port = (uint16_t)atoi(colon+1);
00066     return initialize(addr, host.c_str(), port);
00067   }
00068   
00069   return initialize(addr, "localhost", (uint16_t)atoi(addrStr));
00070 }
00071 
00075 bool InetAddr::initialize(struct sockaddr_in *addr, uint32_t haddr, uint16_t port) {
00076   memset(addr, 0 , sizeof(sockaddr_in));
00077   addr->sin_family = AF_INET;
00078   addr->sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(haddr);
00079   addr->sin_port = htons(port);
00080   return true;
00081 }

00086 const char *InetAddr::string_format(std::string &addrStr, struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00087   addrStr = (std::string)inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr) + ":" + ntohs(addr.sin_port);
00088   return addrStr.c_str();
00089 }

00095 void InetAddr::get_hostname(std::string &hostname) {
00096   struct utsname u;
00097   uname(&u);
00098   hostname = u.nodename;
00099 }
